Package it.polimi.se2018.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Configuration
    This class represents the server configuration, loaded from file 'config.properties'
    Controller
    This class is the highest level class in Controller package.
    GameManager
    This class is the "real" controller, indeed it implements all the main functionalities to handle a Game.
    RoundManager
    This class is at a lower level than GameManager It handles the operations and the logic relating to the round phase
    ToolCardController
    This class implements the logic behind the ToolCard object.
    ToolCardController.Operations
    A static class where belongs all operations of every toolcard.
    TurnManager
    This class is at a lower level than RoundManager It handles the operations and the logic relating to a player's turn phase
    TurnManager.Checks
    A static class where belongs all checks of every toolcard.
